    • chooseCards

      public void chooseCards​(java.util.List<GodCardProxy> godCards)

      Parameters:

    • activateAddCardsButton

      private void activateAddCardsButton​(javafx.scene.image.Image addGodImg, javafx.scene.image.Image addGodInactiveImg, javafx.scene.image.ImageView addGod, javafx.scene.image.Image removeGodImg, javafx.scene.image.Image removeGodInactiveImg, javafx.scene.image.ImageView removeGod, int[] cardsIndexes, java.util.List<GodCardProxy> godCards)
      This method activates add button in the Choose cards box when chosen cards are less than number of players
      Parameters:
      addGodImg - Add button image
      addGodInactiveImg - Add button Inactive image
      addGod - Add button
      removeGodImg - Remove button image
      removeGodInactiveImg - Remove button inactive image
      removeGod - Remove button
      cardsIndexes - Indexes of all cards, it saves index in order to show or hide the right card in the list of all cards (left side of chooseCardsPane
      godCards - All god cards (list of godCardProxy)

    • deactivateAddCardsButton

      private void deactivateAddCardsButton​(javafx.scene.image.Image addGodInactiveImg, javafx.scene.image.ImageView addGod)
      This method deactivates add button in the Choose cards box when chosen cards are as many as number of players
      Parameters:
      addGodInactiveImg - Add button inactive image
      addGod - Add button

      Parameters:
      removeGodImg - Remove button image
      removeGodInactiveImg - Remove button inactive image
      removeGod - Remove button

    • chosenCards

      public int[] chosenCards() throws TimeOutException
      This method waits for player (if he is the challenger) to choose all the cards of the match and returns them
      Returns:
      Chosen cards indexes (it refers to list of cards)
      Throws:
      TimeOutException - Exception thrown when the time to do an action runs out

    • chosenCard

      public int chosenCard() throws TimeOutException
      This method waits for player to choose his card for the match and returns it
      Returns:
      Chosen card index (it refers to list of cards)
      Throws:
      TimeOutException - Exception thrown when the time to do an action runs out

    • chosenDestination

      public int chosenDestination() throws TimeOutException
      This method wait for player to chose a destination and returns it
      Returns:
      Chosen destination
      Throws:
      TimeOutException - Exception thrown when the time to do an action runs out

      public void createConfirmTurnPopup()
      This method creates confirm turn popup

    • showConfirmTurnPopup

      public int showConfirmTurnPopup() throws TimeOutException
      This method waits for player to choose to undo or confirm his turn and returns the answer It shows confirmTurn popup
      Returns:
      Undo or Confirm turn answer
      Throws:
      TimeOutException - Exception thrown when the time to do an action runs out
